EmailTemplate.name: Consolidation-NCDJPA_0329.Thanks For Your Interest
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for your interest in our Consolidation Webinar - Case Study Download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for Attending! Consolidation: Breaking Technological and Political Barriers to Build Regional Partnerships Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Public Safety Professional}},
Thank you for your interest our webinar on Consolidation: Breaking Technological and Political Barriers to Build Regional Partnerships based on the regional partnership of North County Dispatch JPA.
Access the North County Dispatch JPA Case Study Now. <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/March29Webinar_Consolidation_CaseSTudy.pdf>
If you are planning a consolidation project or looking for new technology solutions, contact us to help in your initial exploration.
Regards,
TriTech Software Systems
